resources.string:
MoreLocale is not granted a CHANGE_CONFIGURATION permission.
If you're able to use development tools, you can grant the permission manually by 'pm' command.

If you have SuperUser privilege on your device.
MoreLocale could get the permission automatically.

MoreLocale is not granted a CHANGE_CONFIGURATION and a WRITE_SETTINGS permission.
If you're able to use development tools, you can grant the permission manually by 'pm' command.

If you have SuperUser privilege on your device.
MoreLocale could get the permission automatically.

1. On Develop Options enable USB debugging mode and Disable Permission Monitoring if available.\n2. Connect the device to your PC and type command below.\nadb shell pm grant jp.co.c_lis.ccl.morelocale android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
Go to settings to grant WRITE_SETTINGS permission
